test_cases.objective: To verify that the deviation lifecycle is correctly configured with states: Draft, Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, and Closure.

test_steps.action: Log in to the system and navigate to the deviation management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the deviation management module.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and observe the initial state.
test_steps.expected_result: New deviation record is created and initial state is set to Draft.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation through each state: Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, and Closure.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation successfully transitions through each state as per configuration.

acceptance_criteria: Deviation lifecycle states are correctly configured and transitions are successful.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all state transitions are logged in the audit trail.

test_cases.objective: To validate that risk scoring rules are correctly implemented using vendor scripting.

test_steps.action: Log in to the system and navigate to the deviation management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully logs in and accesses the deviation management module.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and input risk assessment data.
test_steps.expected_result: New deviation record is created and risk assessment data is inputted.

test_steps.action: Verify the calculated risk score based on the inputted data.
test_steps.expected_result: Risk score is correctly calculated according to the configured rules.

acceptance_criteria: Risk scoring rules are correctly implemented and risk scores are accurately calculated.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all risk scoring calculations are logged in the audit trail.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the deviation lifecycle states (Draft, Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, Closure) transition correctly according to configured rules.
prerequisites: System is configured with deviation workflow
Test user with appropriate permissions is available

test_steps.action: Log in to the system and create a new deviation in Draft state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation is successfully created and visible in Draft state.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation to Under Review state and verify required fields.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation transitions to Under Review state only when mandatory fields are completed.

test_steps.action: Attempt to transition through all states up to Closure, capturing e-signature requirements.
test_steps.expected_result: Each state transition enforces e-signatures where configured and follows business rules.

acceptance_criteria: All state transitions comply with configured workflow rules
E-signatures are enforced at specified transitions
Mandatory fields are validated before state changes
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all state transitions
Record must retain all e-signatures and timestamps

test_cases.objective: Validate that mandatory fields and attachments are enforced according to configured risk scoring rules.
prerequisites: System with configured risk scoring rules
Test deviations with different risk levels

test_steps.action: Create a deviation with low risk score and attempt to submit without attachments.
test_steps.expected_result: System allows submission when no attachments are required for low risk.

test_steps.action: Create a high-risk deviation missing required investigation fields.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents state transition until all mandatory high-risk fields are completed.

test_steps.action: Verify risk score recalculation after field updates.
test_steps.expected_result: Changing risk-impacting fields automatically updates risk score and requirements.

acceptance_criteria: Field enforcement matches configured risk rules
Risk score calculations are accurate and immediate
System prevents progression when requirements aren't met
data_integrity_requirements: Risk scores must be stored with deviation records
All field validations must be logged in audit trail

test_cases.objective: Verify that the configured deviation lifecycle states (Draft, Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, Closure) transition correctly according to business rules.
prerequisites: Sample deviation record in Draft state

test_steps.action: Log in as a QA user and open the deviation record in Draft state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is displayed with Draft status and editable fields.

test_steps.action: Submit the deviation for review and verify state transition.
test_steps.expected_result: State changes to Under Review and appropriate notifications are sent.

test_steps.action: Approve the deviation and initiate investigation.
test_steps.expected_result: State changes to Investigation and investigation team is assigned.

acceptance_criteria: All state transitions occur as configured
Required fields are enforced at each state
E-signatures are captured at designated transitions
data_integrity_requirements: ALCOA+ compliant audit trail for all state changes
E-signature verification at critical transitions

test_cases.objective: Validate that mandatory fields and attachments are properly enforced based on configured risk scoring rules.
prerequisites: System configured with risk scoring rules
Test users with deviation creation permissions
Sample high-risk and low-risk deviation scenarios

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation with low risk score and attempt to submit without all mandatory fields.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents submission and highlights missing mandatory fields.

test_steps.action: Complete all mandatory fields for low risk deviation and submit.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation is successfully submitted with only basic required fields.

test_steps.action: Create a high-risk deviation and verify additional mandatory fields and attachments.
test_steps.expected_result: System enforces additional requirements for high-risk deviations.

acceptance_criteria: Field enforcement matches configured rules for each risk level
System prevents progression when requirements are not met
Risk score calculation is accurate per configured algorithm
data_integrity_requirements: Risk score calculation audit trail
Field requirement enforcement logs

test_cases.objective: Ensure the deviation lifecycle states (Draft, Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, Closure) transition correctly based on configured rules.
prerequisites: System configured with deviation lifecycle states

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record in the Draft state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is successfully created in the Draft state.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation to the Under Review state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record transitions to the Under Review state.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation to the Investigation state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record transitions to the Investigation state.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation to the CAPA state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record transitions to the CAPA state.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation to the Closure state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record transitions to the Closure state.

acceptance_criteria: All state transitions occur as expected
Audit trail records each transition
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture all state transitions
Mandatory fields must be populated at each state

test_cases.test_name: Validate CAPA Linkage and Effectiveness Checks
test_cases.objective: Verify that CAPA records are correctly linked to deviations and effectiveness checks are enforced.
prerequisites: Test deviation record in CAPA state

test_steps.action: Create a CAPA record linked to the deviation.
test_steps.expected_result: CAPA record is successfully created and linked to the deviation.

test_steps.action: Perform an effectiveness check on the CAPA record.
test_steps.expected_result: Effectiveness check is completed and recorded in the CAPA record.

test_steps.action: Verify the CAPA record status after effectiveness check.
test_steps.expected_result: CAPA record status reflects the outcome of the effectiveness check.

acceptance_criteria: CAPA records are correctly linked to deviations
Effectiveness checks are enforced and recorded
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail must capture CAPA linkage and effectiveness checks
Mandatory fields must be populated for CAPA records

test_cases.objective: To ensure the deviation lifecycle is correctly configured with states: Draft, Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, Closure.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the deviation management module.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation management module is accessible.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created with Draft state.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation through all configured states.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation transitions correctly through all states.

acceptance_criteria: Deviation lifecycle states are correctly configured and functional.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure all state transitions are logged in the audit trail.

test_cases.objective: To verify the implementation of risk scoring rules using vendor scripting.

test_steps.action: Navigate to the risk scoring configuration section.
test_steps.expected_result: Risk scoring configuration section is accessible.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record with varying risk factors.
test_steps.expected_result: Risk score is calculated correctly based on configured rules.

test_steps.action: Verify the risk score updates with changes to risk factors.
test_steps.expected_result: Risk score updates dynamically with changes.

acceptance_criteria: Risk scoring rules are correctly implemented and functional.
data_integrity_requirements: Ensure risk score calculations are logged in the audit trail.

test_cases.objective: Ensure the deviation lifecycle states (Draft, Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, Closure) are correctly configured and enforced.
prerequisites: System configured with deviation lifecycle states

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and set the state to Draft.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created and state is set to Draft.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation state to Under Review.
test_steps.expected_result: State is updated to Under Review and e-signature is enforced.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation state to Investigation.
test_steps.expected_result: State is updated to Investigation and mandatory fields are enforced.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation state to CAPA.
test_steps.expected_result: State is updated to CAPA and CAPA linkage is enforced.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation state to Closure.
test_steps.expected_result: State is updated to Closure and record is closed.

acceptance_criteria: All state transitions are correctly enforced
E-signatures are enforced at key transitions
Mandatory fields are enforced by risk level
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for state transitions
Record integrity during state changes

test_cases.test_name: Validate Risk Scoring Rules and Mandatory Fields
test_cases.objective: Verify that risk scoring rules are correctly implemented and mandatory fields are enforced based on risk level.
prerequisites: System configured with risk scoring rules

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and assign a low risk score.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created with low risk score.

test_steps.action: Verify mandatory fields and attachments for low risk.
test_steps.expected_result: Mandatory fields and attachments are correctly enforced for low risk.

test_steps.action: Assign a high risk score to the deviation record.
test_steps.expected_result: Risk score is updated to high.

test_steps.action: Verify mandatory fields and attachments for high risk.
test_steps.expected_result: Mandatory fields and attachments are correctly enforced for high risk.

acceptance_criteria: Risk scoring rules are correctly implemented
Mandatory fields and attachments are enforced based on risk level
data_integrity_requirements: Audit trail for risk score changes
Record integrity during risk score updates

test_cases.objective: Ensure the deviation lifecycle states (Draft, Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, Closure) are correctly configured and transitions are enforced with e-signatures.
prerequisites: System configured with deviation lifecycle states

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and set it to Draft state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created and set to Draft state.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation record to Under Review state.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record transitions to Under Review state with e-signature prompt.

test_steps.action: Transition the deviation record to Investigation state.

acceptance_criteria: All state transitions are correctly enforced with e-signatures.
Deviation lifecycle states are correctly configured.

test_cases.test_name: Validate Risk Scoring Rules and Mandatory Fields
test_cases.objective: Verify that risk scoring rules are correctly implemented and mandatory fields and attachments are enforced based on risk level.
prerequisites: System configured with risk scoring rules

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record with low risk level.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created with low risk level.

test_steps.action: Attempt to save the deviation record without filling mandatory fields.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents saving and prompts to fill mandatory fields.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record with high risk level.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record is created with high risk level.

test_steps.action: Attempt to save the deviation record without attaching required documents.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents saving and prompts to attach required documents.

acceptance_criteria: Risk scoring rules are correctly implemented.
Mandatory fields and attachments are enforced based on risk level.
data_integrity_requirements: ALCOA+ compliant audit trail

test_cases.objective: To verify that risk scoring rules are correctly implemented using vendor scripting.

test_steps.action: Log in to the QMS system and navigate to the deviation management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User is able to access the deviation management module.

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and input risk factors.
test_steps.expected_result: Risk factors are accepted and risk score is calculated.

test_steps.action: Verify the calculated risk score against predefined rules.

test_cases.objective: Verify that the deviation lifecycle states (Draft, Under Review, Investigation, CAPA, Closure) transition correctly according to configured business rules.
prerequisites: Sample deviation record in Draft state

test_steps.action: Log in as a QA user and navigate to the deviation management module.
test_steps.expected_result: User successfully accesses the deviation management interface.

test_steps.action: Select the sample deviation record in Draft state and initiate transition to Under Review.
test_steps.expected_result: System prompts for required fields and attachments before allowing transition.

test_steps.action: Complete all mandatory fields and attach required documents, then submit for review.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation record successfully transitions to Under Review state with timestamp.

test_steps.action: Repeat transitions through all configured states (Investigation, CAPA, Closure) with appropriate approvals.
test_steps.expected_result: Each state transition completes successfully with required e-signatures and audit trail entries.

acceptance_criteria: All state transitions execute according to configured workflow
Mandatory field validation enforced at each transition
E-signatures captured for all approval steps
Complete audit trail maintained for all state changes
data_integrity_requirements: State transitions must be recorded with timestamp and user ID
No state transitions should bypass required approvals
urs_requirements: URS-022-005: Enforce e-signatures at key transitions

test_cases.objective: Verify that mandatory fields and attachments are dynamically enforced based on configured risk scoring rules.
prerequisites: System with configured risk scoring rules
Test deviations with different risk levels

test_steps.action: Create a new deviation record and set risk score to low (1-3).
test_steps.expected_result: System displays only baseline mandatory fields for low-risk deviations.

test_steps.action: Attempt to submit the deviation without completing all mandatory fields.
test_steps.expected_result: System prevents submission and highlights missing fields.

test_steps.action: Complete all mandatory fields and attach required documents, then submit.
test_steps.expected_result: Deviation successfully submits with all required data.

test_steps.action: Repeat process with medium (4-6) and high (7-10) risk deviations.
test_steps.expected_result: Additional fields and attachments become mandatory as risk level increases.

acceptance_criteria: Field requirements match configured rules for each risk level
System prevents submission when required fields/attachments are missing
Risk score changes dynamically update field requirements
Configuration changes are reflected immediately without system restart
data_integrity_requirements: Risk score must be captured before field validation
No bypass of mandatory field requirements
urs_requirements: URS-022-003: Configure mandatory fields by risk level
